scenario.name: caller_outside
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field1]@[local_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "[field0]" <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number]zhg8 To: "[field1]"<sip:[field1]@[local_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> User-Agent: SIPp client mode version [sipp_version] Allow: INVITE,PRACK,ACK,UPDATE,CANCEL,BYE,OPTIONS,INFO,SUBSCRIBE,REFER,NOTIFY Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=SIPp [pid][call_number] 8[pid][call_number]8 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=SIPp Normal Call Test t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 101 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000/1 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "[field0]" <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number]zhg8 To: "[field1]"<sip:[field1]@[local_ip]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: normal call scenario by wangwei user-agent: SIPp client mode version [sipp_version] Content-Length: 0

INFO sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "[field0]" <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number]zhg8 To: "[field1]"<sip:[field1]@[local_ip]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 INFO Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: normal call scenario by wangwei user-agent: SIPp client Content-type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=1 Duration=160

Signal=2 Duration=160

BYE sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[local_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "[field0]" <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number]zhg8 To: "[field1]"<sip:[field1]@[local_ip]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 6 BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: normal call scenario by wangwei Content-Length: 0
